title: Hurts, Don't It
description:
Field and the NFL Live Crew discuss AJ Brown joining the Eagles OTAs, the Raiders’ receiving core, AJ Dillon’s comments on Jordan Love, John Lynch’s comments on Deebo’s future with the team, and who the most versatile offensive player in the NFL is. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: NFL Live: What does Jalen Hurts need to show this season and sound bytes from around the league..
